location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Map of Country Round Zubair and Shaiba’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:355 x 403 mm, on sheet 418 x 473 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:General Staff India. S.D.O. No. 1187, February, 1915.Distinctive Features:Sketch map of Zubair and surrounding area showing location of forts and watch towers as well as communication features i.e. telephone line from Shaiba and roads with distances reported. Contains a note on location of fresh water sources with the approximate location of wells marked on a map.Above scale statement in the left centre: ‘(Sd.) J.F. Maiklejohn, Lieutenant 33rd ”Q.V.O.” Light Cavalry, Shaiba Fort, 23.1.1915’ and ‘(Sd.) C.C.R. Murphy, Major, G.S.O. (2) Int.’.Marked ‘For Official Use Only’.
